title: ISic000640. I.Sicily inscription 000640
body:
Facsimile Images

Πουβλειλί-
α ((ivy-leaf)) Ἀγάθιν ((ivy-leaf))
χρηστά ((·)) χαῖρε ((·))
ἔζησεν ἔτη ((·)) λγ´ ((·))

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1994

English translation

Farewell worthy Publilia Agathin! She lived for 33 years.

Italian translation

Addio, degna Publilia Agathin! Ella visse 33 anni.

commentary

bibliography

  • 1994.0763 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 44.0746 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Manganaro 1994 85 no.3b https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001825
